title: 14k Yellow or White Gold 2x11mm Huggie Hoop Earrings
features: Elegant huggie hoop earrings that come in an exquisite design you would love to flaunt.
The huggie hoop earrings are made of 14k gold properly stamped and marked.
These earrings come in beautiful white color that adds a lot more to its elegance.
These earrings have a 1 year warranty plus 30 days money back guarantee.
The dimensions of the product are 11 mm x 2 mm.
description: For all the ladies out there! Now, is the time to rise above the mundane and pamper yourself a bit with our exotic collection of stunning earrings. So, wear these and get ready to be a style icon. The huggie hoop earrings are made of 14k gold that have been duly stamped and marked as a sign of its originality. These huggie earrings are white and yellow gold in color which give these a stunning and elegant look. Also, the color combination would complement all your attires. The yellow gold earrings have got a gorgeous design that would make you look very charming and beautiful in all respects. The earrings have been made of supreme quality material and we also vow a complete refund of your money within 30 days in case we fail to fulfill our promises. The package includes a gift box as well (domestic shipments only). So, wait no more and grab these amazing pair of earrings today! Please note that images have been enlarged to show better detail.
